Summary: 3 UFOs flying south to north...viewed for 5 minutes.
divs: sighting detailsthis is an account of my wife's grandfathers experience (him telling the story in first person): after watching a movie, i got up as i usually do every night and went over to lock the kitchen door. as i looked out the window, i saw three (3) objects in the sky (please see attached file of a drawing). i watched them for at least five (5) minutes moving from south to north (i was looking towards the southeast) and the objects traveled not like a plane, rather they traveled almost with no effort, very calm and smooth and very slow. the three (3) objects had a circluar shape with three (3) lights on each one. two (2) of the lights were a very bright white light and the other was a pinkish\red. the objects had an amber glow\tint around them. if you held your hand, arms length away, the space between each object was from my thumb to my pinky. as i was holding out my hand, if i brought my hand over the object to try to block it out, i could still see the amberish glow residing around the object.
